MujimoroLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 26 Jun 2019Easiest was is through Robo-advisors like Autowealth and StashAway. They create and maintain a portfolio for you depending on your risk appetite. Caveat of course is a management fee (which you can avoid if you do everything yourself).0 comments0
